actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-615.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4164) to strengthen and expand the economic base of the Nation, develop human resources, reduce structural unemployment, increase productivity, and strengthen the Nation's defense capabilities by assisting the States to expand, improve, and update high-quality programs of vocational-technical education, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4164 (vocational and technical education programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4164) to strengthen and expand the economic base of the Nation, develop human resources, reduce structural unemployment, increase productivity, and strengthen the Nation's defense capabilities by assisting the States to expand, improve, and update high-quality programs of vocational-technical education, and for other purposes.
